name: Death Mask (itch) (_superspaceturtle)
description:
Embark on a journey to the World of the living! Save all the souls that got trapped there. Equip stronger and stronger masks. You can buy them from a friendly shopkeeper that certainly didn't trap anyone at the end of the level (definitely not foreshadowing (100% not trying to make you play this game for longer with secret content)).

Very spoilery

Tips:

- Better masks gives you more health AND more time you can spend in the World of living

- Use environment to your advantage. Take cover when necessary

- Sometimes its wiser to spend money on new sword instead of better mask

- When you swing your sword and then quickly repeat "A", "D" you can chain more damage ("It's not a bug, it's a feature!")

- If you have problem with the window showing partially off screen, try pressing "Windows + arrow keys" to move it. Thanks DrManatee for spotting this problem.

???????

This game is submission for Wowie Game Jam 3.0
